attributes.action: Commission a Taylor Swift musical for production in the West End
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We, the undersigned, humbly request that Her Majesty's Government set up an independent committee to commission a musical commemorating the life and times of country superstar Taylor Swift (aka. tswizzle) for production in the London West End.

Taylor Swift is the voice of a generation.  She has influenced hundreds of millions of people, young and old, with her feel-good music and life lessons that teach us all something about being happy, free, confused, and lonely at the same time.

Go talk to your friends, talk to my friends, talk to me; this was meant to be.

Tf london could speak for itself it would tell tswizzle "You belong with me".

Yours truly,

~The Undersigned~
